title: Sysorex CMO to Talk on the “Internet of Things” at CTIA Super Mobility Conference in Las Vegas
text:
Sysorex CMO to Talk on the “Internet of Things” at CTIA Super Mobility Conference in Las Vegas Sage Osterfeld to discuss how millions of connected devices are creating new opportunities and transforming industries September 03, 2015 09:00 AM   
PALO ALTO, Calif.- Big data analytics and solutions provider Sysorex (NASDAQ:SYRX) today announced that its chief marketing officer, Sage Osterfeld, will be joining a panel of industry leaders discussing how millions of “smart” Internet-connected devices are becoming major factors in enterprise decision-making and innovation around the globe. Osterfeld will be part of the “App-solutely Enterprise” sessions at CTIA Super Mobility 2015 in Las Vegas September 9 – 11. 
“When it comes to Internet-connected devices, it’s things like smartphones, TVs and appliances that get all the attention,” Osterfeld said. “But the truth is, the real game-changers are coming from networks of devices in communication with other machines, not people. They're doing everything from fertilizing crops and running factories to directing traffic and trading stocks. The Internet of Things might be invisible, but it is rapidly becoming the critical component of the global economy,” he said. 
The Internet of Things (IoT) discussion is featured during the CTIA’s App-solutely half-day sessions which focus on taking advantage of mobile and “smart” devices within the enterprise. Osterfeld, whose company specializes in big data analytics for mobile and IoT, will join executives from three other technology firms from various sectors of the industry. The panel is scheduled for 2:15 PM in the Lido Ballroom of the Sands Expo and Convention Center. 
With more than 35,000 participants, CTIA’s Super Mobility is the largest wireless and mobile conference in the Americas. It will be held at the Sands Convention Center in Las Vegas, Nevada, and runs September 9 - 11, 2015. Tickets and more information on the conference can be found on the CTIA Super Mobility 2015 website at http://www.ctiasupermobility2015.com . 
About Sysorex 
Sysorex develops the systems and solutions that power the data-driven enterprise. With an innovative approach to big data, analytics and the Internet of Things (IoT), we blend virtual data from software and networks with the huge volume of physical data generated by mobile devices and Internet-connected things to open new worlds of insight. Our unique solutions are helping organizations worldwide improve decision making, increase productivity, and fuel the discoveries of tomorrow. Headquartered in Palo Alto, California, we have regional offices in North America, South America, Europe and the Middle East. Visit www.sysorex.com , follow us @SysorexGlobal and Link up on LinkedIn .
